original_text: So when the famine had spread over all the land, Joseph opened all the storehouses and sold to the Egyptians, for the famine was severe in the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 온 지면에 기근이 있으매 요셉이 모든 창고를 열고 애굽 백성에게 팔새 애굽 땅에 기근이 심하며

sentences.original_text: So when the famine had spread over all the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 기근이 온 땅에 퍼졌을 때

sentences.original_text: for the famine was severe in the land of Egypt
